name: THE ASSOCIATION FOR CARE OF COGNITIVE, COMMUNICATIVE AND OTHER RELATED DISORDERS (ACCCORD)
briefDescription: ACCCORD was registered as a not-for-profit initiative in the year 2007 under the Societies Registration Act, XXI/1860 (No.459/07). It has also approvals from the Govt. of Kerala, Dept. of Social Welfare under PWD Act, 1995 (No.217) as well as from the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment, Govt. of India under the National Trust Act 1999, (No.140217231661021/MR/CP/AUTISM/MD).RICCCH (Rehabilitation Institute for Cognitively and Communicatively Challenged) was established under ACCCORD on November 14, 2007, for addressing cognitive, communicative and other related developmental disorders from an integrated multi disciplinary professional perspective based on the WHO guidelines.
